value:
$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face|Ah, Alfonse! Welcome home.
I am so happy to see you. I feel
better than I have in a long time.$k$pBut it seems Gustav has come down
with the sleep sickness... We should
help him, don't you agree?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Y-yes, Mother...$k$pBut...Father? He has sleep sickness?$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|Hurry along, Alfonse. Do not fret.
Veronica and I are coming with you.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Oh, Zacharias. Thank you. I'm so
glad to have the two of you working
with us.$k$p$Sbs8000|...But, hm. I can't remember... When
was it that you started helping us?$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|...Helping?$k$p...You misunderstand.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I— What?$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|We are not here to help. No.
We came to...$k$p...What was it again?
Oh, that's right.$k$p$EFace_Smile|We came to kill the Askran royalty.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Sbs150|$Fo500,255,0,0,255|$Fi500|...Aaaaagh!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|M-Mother?! Zacharias! What are y—$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|Askr...will be ended by these hands.
Such is the fate of Emblian blood.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Yes. Askr must be destroyed.
Destroyed...destroyed...DESTROYED.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...S-stop, you two! Please!$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|No use fighting it... Askr must
be destroyed.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|We must bring Askr to an end.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Ugh... If I can't stop them...$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_HAPPY_01,0|$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Dreams are the people's rest...
Dreams are the people's hopes...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Wh-who's there?!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Nightmares...shoo! Away with you!$k$pLjósálfheimr is the land for happy
dreams—and happy dreams only.$k$p$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|This is...$k$pZacharias... Princess Veronica...
They're...disappearing?$k$pWh-who are you?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, hello! Rise and shine!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|R-rise and...shine?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I'm Peony! I'm a ljósálfar—or light elf,
you might say. I'm from the land of
dreams, Ljósálfheimr.$k$p$Sbs150|
